channel.title: PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Project Public Demo - December 2022 Session
item.description: The project’s public demo was held for the ninth time this year and streamed live on December 14th, 2022.

item.title: Announcing December PrestaShop Project Public Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public demo for the PrestaShop Project will happen tomorrow, on Wednesday, December 14th, 2022 at 4pm CET!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.8.8 Is Available
item.description: It has been decided to deliver a new maintenance release for 1.7.8.x branch. Please note that this will be the last regular 1.7.8.x patch version, as the branch now enters security-only maintenance phase. Next regular patches will now target 8.0.x branch.

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – November 2022 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it is also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the software translations evolved in November!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Monthly - November
item.description: In this Core Monthly, I will focus on a few important topics that are being worked on inside the project, the new product page, initiatives, new releases, and some great contributions from the community.

item.title: Introducing: PrestaShop Project Office Hours
item.description: A few weeks ago, a new initiative was started: PrestaShop Project Office Hours.

item.title: PrestaShop Project Public Demo - November 2022 Session
item.description: The project’s public demo was held for the eighth time this year and streamed live on November 9th, 2022.

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – October 2022 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it is also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the translations of the software evolved in October!

item.title: Announcing November PrestaShop Project Public Demo
item.description: Friendly reminder, that the public demo for the PrestaShop Project from the maintainers team will happen next week, on Wednesday, November 9th, 2022 at 4pm CET!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Weekly - Week 43 of 2022
item.description: This edition of the Core Weekly report highlights changes in PrestaShop’s core codebase from Monday 24th to Sunday 30th of October 2022.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 Is Available
item.description: The maintainers team is pleased to announce that PrestaShop 8.0 is officially available.

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – September 2022 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it is also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report will tell you how the translations of the software evolved in September!

item.title: PrestaShop Core Weekly - Week 41 of 2022
item.description: This edition of the Core Weekly report highlights changes in PrestaShop’s core codebase from Monday 10th to Sunday 16th of October 2022.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 Release Candidate Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: The maintainers team is pleased to announce the first release candidate of PrestaShop 8.0.

item.title: Hacktoberfest and PrestaShop: how you can participate in this 2022 edition
item.description: October is now here and Hacktoberfest, a month-long celebration of open source software, has started. We have recently written an article about the event, how you can get involved and all the different rules. You can know more in our Hacktoberfest 2022 article.
